name: backend-static-testing-setup
description: Static testing like eslint, prettier etc.

scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test -- --onlyChanged && npm run build
scripts.clinic:doctor: npm run build && NODE_ENV=local clinic doctor --on-port 'autocannon localhost:$PORT/todos' -- node ./dist/index.js
scripts.clinic:flame: npm run build && NODE_ENV=local clinic flame --on-port 'autocannon localhost:$PORT/todos' -- node ./dist/index.js
scripts.clinic:bubbleprof: npm run build && NODE_ENV=local clinic bubbleprof --on-port 'autocannon localhost:$PORT/todos' -- node ./dist/index.js

author: jatin parate <jatin.parate@mlveda.com>
